name: A Mother's Cry
description:
Wrapped in the same garments he had left in, her son had finally come home.
Barely recognisable, she looked at his wounds with pain in her eyes.
Her tears fell like the rain of a burst vein.
Why him?
Why now?
For she did not see he had already crossed over.
She wept for flesh.
He was now part of the Earth,Air and Sky. Once a Prince. Now a man.
King Femi was in his final home of peace.
